name: option-type
description: An Option type for Flow, inspired by Rust.

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run flow && npm run lint && mkdir dist
scripts.build-umd: BABEL_ENV=umd babel index.js -o dist/index.umd.js && cp index.js dist/index.umd.js.flow
scripts.build-esm: BABEL_ENV=esm babel index.js -o dist/index.esm.js && cp index.js dist/index.esm.js.flow
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
scripts.pretest: npm run flow && npm run lint

author: David Graham
